content: this crochet eyeball amigurumi is part of my new halloween collection called bowloween bowling + halloween it s a collections of halloween characters that work as bowling pins and the eyeball as bowling ball you will find the other patterns at this link 1 the pattern is perfect for halloween decorations or gifts you can also sell the finished product in markets and fairs crochet skill level advanced beginner skills/stitches required chain magic_ring slip_stitch single_crochet increase decrease the measurement really depends on the type of yarn and on the hook size you use i used cotton 8/6 3mm hook questions contact us if you have any questions about the pattern please contact us at info@elendipity com we would be happy to help you make your eyeball show me your creations once you ve made your eyeball please tag us on instagram @_elendipity_ so we can see your creation we would love to see it happy crocheting 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/eleonora-cugini-elendipity
